DOC.brief_summary: The objective current study determine relative bioavailability BI 10773 / metformin fix dose combination tablet compare single tablet BI 10773 metformin administer together assess effect food bioavailability fix dose combination tablet
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Fixed Dose Combination Tablet With Empagliflozin ( BI 10773 ) Metformin Compared With Monocomponents Effect Food Bioavailability
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy male female accord follow criterion 2 . Body Mass Index 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 ( incl . ) Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any finding medical examination ( include Blood Pressure , Pulse Rate electrocardiogram ) deviate normal clinical relevance 2 . Any evidence clinically relevant concomitant disease
